title: Decoding a web of crypto and dreams: The tale of Zhimin Qian
description: Dreams of grandeur, a fugitive’s flight, and the shadowy realm of cryptocurrency collide in the life of Zhimin Qian, whose ambitions soared as high as becoming royalty in a land few recognize. This saga unfolds with the dreams of Qian, a 45-year-old woman embroiled in accusations of orchestrating a colossal £5bn scam. Her fantastical aspirations […]

title: Email scam nets millions from FTX, BlockFi creditors’ wallets
description: A sophisticated email phishing operation targeting creditors of bankrupt crypto firms BlockFi and FTX has successfully amassed millions of dollars. The scam, involving cryptocurrencies and NFTs, came to light through security expert Plumferno’s investigative efforts on social media platform X. Utilizing a network of contacts, Plumferno traced the origin of the stolen assets to phishing […]

title: Dogecoin and SHIB communities flock to the Fezoo presale
description: Fezoo (FEZ) is a trending investment choice that has Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB) investors joining its ongoing presale #partnercontent
